eu_initiatives:
Member of BIC Bio Industry Consortium  
Occasional participant to RDT programs
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
member of BIC as founding members  
member of EuropaBio
goals__remit:
-To add value to and find new commercial opportunities for crops through R&D. 
 -To develop innovative, competitive, and environmentally-friendly processes, with a view to promoting sustainable development and industrial ecology. 
-To favour an integrated approach to biorefining, enabling the entire plant to be used. 
-To use synergies between different resources to develop original molecules. 
-To promote the use of plant matter in industrial applications, and in the economy and in society in general.
